drupalNodeEvent.title: China’s New Politics: What have we learned from the 20th Party Congress

field_speakers.processed:
Joseph Fewsmith, Professor of International Relations and Political Science, Boston University Pardee School of Global Studies
Lucy Hornby, Visiting Scholar, Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies, Former Beijing correspondent, Financial Times
Anthony Saich, Director of the Rajawali Foundation Institute for Asia and Daewoo Professor of International Affairs, Harvard Kennedy School
Yuhua Wang, Professor of Government, Harvard University
Moderator: Mark Wu, Director, Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies; Henry L. Stimson Professor of Law, Harvard Law School

field_description.processed:
Speakers:
Joseph Fewsmith, Professor of International Relations and Political Science, Boston University Pardee School of Global Studies
Lucy Hornby, Visiting Scholar, Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies, Former Beijing correspondent, Financial Times
Anthony Saich, Director of the Rajawali Foundation Institute for Asia and Daewoo Professor of International Affairs, Harvard Kennedy School
Yuhua Wang, Professor of Government, Harvard University

Moderator: Mark Wu, Director, Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies; Henry L. Stimson Professor of Law, Harvard Law School

Also available on Zoom. Register at: https://harvard.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_1GdhVdTbTaW4E9kNZuPZHA
